mapper.select: SELECT distinct m.perms FROM sys_user_role as ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu as rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu as m on m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('C', 'F') AND m.status = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM sys_menu as m WHERE m.menu_type IN ('C', 'M') AND m.status = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM sys_user_role as ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu as rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu as m on m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('C', 'M') AND m.status = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0
